title: #136: Crime and Punishment with Michael A Wood Jr
description:
Thank you so much for tuning in for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. The boys welcome author of Crime and Punishments: The 21st Century, Michael Wood Jr, to discuss law enforcement and the court system in the United States. To find out more about Michael's work please visit imembermedia.com!
Please check out our sponsor RidgeWallet.com and use the promo code "TFH10" for 10% off your purchase of one of their Ridge Wallets.
https://www.ridgewallet.com
